titleStmt.title: The discoverer vncovered, or A vindication of those four close prisoners in the tower, from the exceptions, uncharitable surmises, and criminations of the author ... who wrote that libellus famosus, called The discoverer, and published June 4, 1649. / By Lapis Fructifera, a notorious Parliamentarian, and friend to the army.
titleStmt.author: Fructifera, Lapis.

notesStmt.note: Imperfect: cropped, with loss of print.
Reproduction of original in: Sutro Library.
